sentences.en: He had to leave his home because of impiety.
sentences.cn: 因为不孝,他不得不离开家.

sentences.en: His last act must be a deed of impiety.
sentences.cn: 他最后的行为就是这一种不孝.

sentences.en: His remarks show impiety to religion.
sentences.cn: 他的话表现出对宗教的不敬.

sentences.en: Then when Pistis saw the impiety of the chief ruler, she was filled with anger.
sentences.cn: 然后,当比提丝看见了首席统治者的不敬的时候, 她充满了愤怒.

words.tran_cn: 不虔诚；不尊敬；无信仰；无信心

trans.tran_cn: 不敬， 不孝，不敬的行为， 不孝的行为
trans.tran_en: lack of respect for religion or God, or an action that shows this
